thread.title: Sharks’ Peter DeBoer era begins with 5-1 win in L.A.

author: Ross McKeon
title: Sharks’ Peter DeBoer era begins with 5-1 win in L.A.
text:
Photo: Sean M. Haffey, Getty Images San Jose’s Brent Burns (left) and Joe Thornton celebrate a first-period goal. San Jose’s Brent Burns (left) and Joe Thornton celebrate a...
LOS ANGELES — The Sharks ushered in the Peter DeBoer era by playing just the kind of game their new head coach wanted. San Jose’s Brent Burns (left) and Joe Thornton celebrate a first-period goal. San Jose’s Brent Burns (left) and Joe Thornton celebrate a...
LOS ANGELES — The Sharks ushered in the Peter DeBoer era by playing just the kind of game their new head coach wanted.
